page.title: 03NEW VILLAGE MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is quite old and we have 240 pupils in the school with about 24 pupils to a class.We have got four years in the school.As we go up through the years the work gets harder and harder. The school has a library,three shared areas,nine classes and a hall for all the school to have assemblies and class assemblies where one class performs a play or shows some work that they have done.This is done in front of the whole school. Sometimes a teacher does an assembly too.At christmas we have a big play where most of the school join in and a lot of families come to watch.
